name: Longshort canyon
description:
A long approach leads to a short slot canyon with a few downclimbs and a single rappel. This area of wet beaver itself is very pretty with beautiful large pools.

Approach

Descent

A series of easy downclimbs will lead to a 15 foot drop that can be downclimbed or rappelled if not comfortable with the drop. Shortly after a 60 foot mandatory rappel will occur before reaching the confluence with wet beaver creek.

Exit

Swim your way up beaver creek until you find an exit that allows escape out of the inner gorge.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background

Explored solo by Garrett in October of 2023. Not sure if had been explored prior but no signs of anchors.
